sub_title: City of Amsterdam | Sr. Advisor to the Mayor and Deputy Mayors on International Social Affairs | Music Journalist | DJ/Producer | Singer/Lyricist
summary:
Personal Profile
A highly competent, educated, motivated, and enthusiastic professional with experience working in government and academic environments. I have a curious nature, which also shows through my experiences as a journalist. I’m a very social and outgoing person who connects, communicates, and cooperates well with others. Over the past decade I've acquired ample experience as a (senior) policy advisor, both on the local and international level. 

Qualifications and Skills:

MA Media & Culture, Specialisation in Film Studies and Philosophy. Graduated Cum Laude in 2009.
University of Amsterdam, 2007 - 2009

BA Media & Culture, Film Studies, Media Theory and Sociology. Minor: English Language and Culture. Graduated in 2007.
University of Amsterdam, 2002 - 2007

Pre-University Education. Graduated in 2001.
Gemeentelijke Scholengemeenschap Schagen, 1994 - 2001

Languages
Dutch: Native speaker
English: Excellent
German: Good
French: Proficient	

Computer skills
Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, WordPress, CMS, Social Media, SEO, etc.

Interests			
Music, art, literature, philosophy, politics, sports, science

treasury_media.title: Niels Tubbing, auteur voor Gonzo (circus) | Muziek.Kunst.Meer.
treasury_media.description: Gonzo (circus) is een papieren tijdschrift dat zes keer per jaar verschijnt. Daarnaast is het een website met blog, recensies, achtergrondverhalen, series en meer. Ook is het een verzameling eigenzinnige professionals die programma’s met muziek en andere kunstvormen (co-) cureren, debatten initiëren en cultuurliefhebbers op andere wijzen inspireren.

projects.title: Gonzo (circus) artikelen
projects.description: A variety of interviews with artists and articles on music, art and culture.

authors.headline: City of Amsterdam | Sr. Advisor to the Mayor and Deputy Mayors on International Social Affairs | Music Journalist | DJ/Producer | Singer/Lyricist

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for advising the mayor and deputy mayors on social affairs at the EU and international level, as well as advising the city management directors and the different departments wihtin the social domain.
- Coordinator on behalf of the city of Amsterdam of the Urban Agenda Partnership for Inclusion of Migrants & Refugees. Since 2016, the Partnership has developed into an effective, outcome-oriented platform for eye-level cooperation and trust-building between cities, Member States, EU institutions, and other stakeholders such civil society actors, international associations, think tanks, as well as migrants and refugees themselves. Since its launch, the Partnership has been co-led by the City of Amsterdam and the European Commission’s Directorate-General for Migration and Home Affairs (DG HOME).
- Coordinator on behalf of the City of Amsterdam of the City Director's Roundtable on Fighting Rising Inequalities. The Roundtable is a group of cities including Amsterdam, Utrecht, Vienna, Stockholm, Helsinki, Tallinn, Barcelona, Frankfurt, Zagreb, Edinburgh, Warsaw, and Lyon working together at City Director level on combating inequality and segregation.
profile_positions.title: Senior Advisor to the Mayors and Deputy Mayors on International Social Affairs

profile_positions.description:
Senior Policy Advisor Integration of Status Holders and Civic Integration

•	Evaluate existing policies and provide strategic input on new directions in the fields of integration of refugees and status holders, specialized in education and integration of women refugees 
•	Evaluate existing policies and provide strategic input on new directions in civic integration of newcomers, with a specialisation in the educational sector
•	Manage official communications with the city council and deputy mayors and between departments.
•	International Coordinator working group Citizenship, Inclusion and Education
•	EU Ambassador City of Amsterdam - working towards increased European and International collaboration
•      EUROCITIES Chair Working Group Migration & Integration
•	Experience with applying for European subsidies
•	Organizing working visits for international delegations
•	Give presentations to large groups of people (in Dutch, English or German)
profile_positions.title: Senior Policy Advisor Civic Integration of Migrants and Refugees

profile_positions.description: Senior Advisor on European social affairs.
profile_positions.title: Coordinator International Social Affairs at Public Affairs (Europe)
Vice Chair of the Eurocities Working Group on Migration and Integration

profile_positions.description:
•	Evaluate existing policies and provide strategic input on new directions in the fields of adult education, language training and integration.
•	Manage official communications with the city council and deputy mayors and between departments.
•	Responsible for welcome policies for EU mobile citizens
•	International Coordinator working group Citizenship, Inclusion and Education
•	EU Ambassador City of Amsterdam - working towards increased European and International collaboration
•      EUROCITIES Vice-chair Working Group Migration
•      House of Skills - contact for adult education
•	Project leader of the Diversity Department’s local policy project ‘Shared History’ for a period of six months (July – Dec 2015).
•	Project leader of the European project ‘Local Welcome Policies for EU-Migrants’, a collaborative project with six European cities for the period of January 2015 until December 2016.
•	Give training sessions to casemanagers about working with customer tracking systems and work processes.
•	Experience with applying for European subsidies
•	Organizing working visits for international delegations
•	Give presentations to large groups of people (in Dutch, English or German)
profile_positions.title: Policy Advisor Adult Education, Integration and European Collaboration

profile_positions.description:
●	Coordinated the legal administrative affairs team (10 fte) concerned with the ‘Wet inburgering’ (Civic Integration Act).
●	Responsible for the successful local implementation and enforcement of the Law for integration, quality control, and the division of labour. 
●	Responsible for implementing new and existing policies at the practical level.
●	Advisory role on policies concerning the enforcement of the Civic Integration Act.
●	Set up and communicated work processes, including department discussion with national governmental bodies.
profile_positions.title: Coordinator Legal Administrative Affairs Civic Integration (10 fte)

profile_positions.description:
●	Enforcement and execution of legal administrative affairs concerning the Law for integration.
●	Partook in meetings, pro-active thinking about implementing policies.
●	Communicated with other (national) governmental bodies about best practices. Assumed large amount of responsibility for the citizens concerned. 
●	Promoted to coordinator in October 2011.
profile_positions.title: Employee Legal Affairs
Chair of the Eurocities Working Group Migration & Integration

profile_positions.description:
Kitty Hawk is an Amsterdam based foursome playing thrashing alternative rock with a hardcore punk attitude. Terrorpop, so to speak. Founded in 2016 they have released their debut EP 'Lines of Flight' in 2018. In 2023 two EP's will see the light: 'Interstitial' (May 2023) and 'Frictional' (summer 2023).


BRASS ORCHIDS
...to wound this autumnal city
So howled out for it to name me
I am here because it called me
Prism, Mirror, Lens...

Have I lost myself and if so when and where?
I feel that somehow I must know
but I don’t even know who the fuck I am

Days dragging
Spent drinking
Lost in echoes
And distortions
If I lost my name
Does that set me free?
I’m tied to this landscape
Of saprophytic qualities
The streets still have their names
But the city is rearranged
In a constant flux
And so it changes us
Dragging
Drinking
Echoes
Distortions
To wander this cerebral city
Caught between these thoughts so gritty
My name lost, now reduced to kiddy

House of Ax

Have I lost myself and if so when and where
I feel that somehow I must know
but I don’t even know who the fuck I am

Refracting
Words written
When ashes
Grey the grass

The thought ‘I am going to die’
Yet blood still beats in my ears
Is this what thinking feels like?
Is this what it means to be alive?
Does this mean my mind is gone?
But what does that even mean?
Is my mental illness real?
Or just an illusion? You tell me

Refracting
Written
Echoes
And distortions
I have come to wound
Have I? Have I?
Am I wounded?
Am I? Am I?
Healed or hurt
Is it the same?
I’m lingering in
Ruins of confusion
Dragging
Drinking
Echoes
Distortions

Do these notebook poems reveal truth
About who I just might be?

So howled out for the world to give me a name

A ghosted smile
Lit by two moons
While a red sun
Burns this city
Forever adjustable
Therefore unlearnable
I’m still lingering, but
I have come...

(NT, standing on the shoulders of Samuel R Delany, 2022)
profile_positions.title: Singer / Lyricist

profile_positions.description:
●	DJ and producer of electronic music (ambient, experimental, new wave, techno, stoner, disco, minimal wave).
●	Also available for a wide variety of parties focusing on music from the 1960s onwards.
profile_positions.title: the Self

profile_positions.description:
●	Journalist for the art and music magazine Gonzo (circus), a bimonthly magazine issued in the Netherlands and Belgium. 
●	Conduct interviews, collect information, and write articles, including album, concert, and book reviews, for online and paper publications.
profile_positions.title: Journalist

profile_positions.description: Part of the music duo that is Black Oysters. Live elektro/techno. Singer, lyricist, synthesizers.
profile_positions.title: Artist

profile_positions.description: ●	Conducted interviews, collected information, and wrote articles and reviews for the now defunct online music magazine Jimmy Alter (www.jimmyalter.nl).
profile_positions.title: Reporter / Editor

profile_positions.description:
●	Wrote blogs about cultural and art events for the website www.newartnight.nl.
●	Responsible for final editing of blogs by other authors.
profile_positions.title: Editor/Blogger

profile_positions.description:
●	Project coordinator for the then recently founded Research School for Media Studies (RMeS), for a fixed period of six months, to great satisfaction of the University of Amsterdam. 
●	Maintained position one day a week, in addition to my job at the City Government of Amsterdam.
●	Responsible for the start up of the research school, including contacting partner universities and professors, setting up member and email lists, and managing website and flyers design.
●	Successfully organised a two-day Summer School conference, including lectures and workshops.
profile_positions.title: Project Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
●	Wrote articles, interviews, reviews, newsletters. Mostly focused on the art and education sector.
●	Wrote newsletters for the JOB Academy, an organisation that deals with the interests of MBO-students in the Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Freelance journalist and writer

volunteer_experiences.description: ●	Assisted the elderly in the Amsterdam neighborhood De Baarsjes with all kinds of services (doing grocery shopping, escorting them to the hospital, gardening, etc.).
Helping out in a variety of ways at the Food Bank Amsterdam on a weekly basis.
